original_text: And they sat before him, the firstborn according to his birthright, and the youngest according to his youth: and the men marvelled one at another.
korean_text: 그들이 요셉 앞에 앉되 그들의 나이에 따라 앉히게 되니 그들이 서로 이상히 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: the firstborn according to his birthright
and the youngest according to his youth
and the men marvelled one at another
